summary.value: Frontend developer with 3+ years’ experience, dedicated and responsible, skilled in engineering client-side and server-side applications, and implementing UI/UX with cutting-edge technologies. Agile, motivated to learn, share knowledge, and grow.

companies.title: Frontend lead at Nikaat Corp
keyResponsibilities: **Matcha Quiz Client Side**: A scalable and resilient client-side application built with pure React.js and minimal dependencies, **** ensuring long-term maintainability and performance. Designed with an offline-first architecture and full mobile-first optimization, it supports seamless multi-language localization, flexible theming, and dynamic route handling for SEO-friendly growth. Its modular design system, strict separation of concerns, and strong caching strategy enable rapid customization, white-label opportunities, and future AI-driven enhancements.
**Matcha Quiz Server Side**: A robust server-side implementation for the Matcha Quiz application, ensuring secure and efficient data handling **** and user management.

**Matcha Panel**: Led a team of three developers and oversaw the Backend Team to ensure seamless API integration  and efficient **** collaboration to build a comprehensive user dashboard enabling management of profiles, preferences, and interactions. Built as a reusable codebase to efficiently handle multiple project user panels within a single source.
**Mint Panel**: A comprehensive user dashboard for managing menstruation and pregnancy cycles, **** featuring interactive data visualization and tracking powered by Chart.js.

**Chatfit**: A ChatGPT-inspired application designed to guide users through an interactive quiz flow, generating personalized workout **** and nutrition plans. Also supports application assistance through predefined automated responses.
